name: z-lang
description: A JavaScript-like language built with ANTLR4

scripts.generate: npm run generate:lexer && npm run generate:parser
scripts.build: npm run generate && npm run build:ts && npm run build:bundle
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm -w playground run dev
scripts.clean: rm -rf packages/*/dist packages/*/*.tsbuildinfo packages/parser/src/generated/*.ts packages/parser/src/generated/*.interp packages/parser/src/generated/*.tokens playground/node_modules/.vite
